quote: Walking with a friend in the dark is better than walking alone in the light.
name: Helen Keller

quote: Loneliness adds beauty to life. It puts a special burn on sunsets and makes night air smell better.
name: Henry Rollins

quote: I'm learning a lot about myself being alone, and doing what I'm doing.
name: Chantal Kreviazuk

quote: The soul that sees beauty may sometimes walk alone.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: A dream you dream alone is only a dream. A dream you dream together is reality.
name: Yoko Ono

quote: The time you feel lonely is the time you most need to be by yourself.
name: Douglas Coupland

quote: Loneliness expresses the pain of being alone and solitude expresses the glory of being alone.
name: Paul Tillich

quote: We are all born alone and die alone. The loneliness is definitely part of the journey of life.
name: Jenova Chen

quote: It is far better to be alone, than to be in bad company.
name: George Washington

quote: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.
name: Helen Keller

quote: In solitude the mind gains strength and learns to lean upon itself.
name: Laurence Sterne

quote: Loneliness is the poverty of self; solitude is the richness of self.
name: May Sarton

quote: The eternal quest of the individual human being is to shatter his loneliness.
name: Norman Cousins

quote: Pray that your loneliness may spur you into finding something to live for, great enough to die for.
name: Dag Hammarskjold

quote: When everything is lonely I can be my best friend.
name: Conor Oberst

quote: Laugh and the world laughs with you, snore and you sleep alone.
name: Anthony Burgess

quote: Being alone is very difficult.
name: Yoko Ono

quote: To go out with the setting sun on an empty beach is to truly embrace your solitude.
name: Jeanne Moreau

quote: Marriage is good for those who are afraid to sleep alone at night.
name: St. Jerome

quote: Man cannot live by bread alone; he must have peanut butter.
name: James A. Garfield

quote: Justice cannot be for one side alone, but must be for both.
name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: The best part about being alone is that you really don't have to answer to anybody. You do what you want.
name: Justin Timberlake

quote: The picture alone, without the written word, leaves half the story untold.
name: James Lafferty

quote: As I get older I'm more and more comfortable being alone.
name: Sienna Miller

quote: It's better to be unhappy alone than unhappy with someone - so far.
name: Marilyn Monroe

quote: What a lovely surprise to finally discover how unlonely being alone can be.
name: Ellen Burstyn

quote: Jealousy is no more than feeling alone against smiling enemies.
name: Elizabeth Bowen

quote: Life could be wonderful if people would leave you alone.
name: Charlie Chaplin

quote: Our Lord has written the promise of resurrection, not in books alone, but in every leaf in springtime.
name: Martin Luther

quote: I only go out to get me a fresh appetite for being alone.
name: Lord Byron

quote: Your grief path is yours alone, and no one else can walk it, and no one else can understand it.
name: Terri Irwin

quote: The doer alone learneth.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Without a family, man, alone in the world, trembles with the cold.
name: Andre Maurois

quote: Every man must do two things alone; he must do his own believing and his own dying.
name: Martin Luther

quote: Love is our true destiny. We do not find the meaning of life by ourselves alone - we find it with another.
name: Thomas Merton

quote: I would rather be a beggar and single than a queen and married.
name: Elizabeth I

quote: Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that proceeds from the mouth of God.
name: Jesus Christ

quote: I never have tantrums. If anything makes me mad, I'm silent. If I'm not talking, leave me alone.
name: Pat Nixon

quote: If you are lonely when you're alone, you are in bad company.
name: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: It was by one Union that we achieved our independence and liberties, and by it alone can they be maintained.
name: James Monroe

quote: It is true that integrity alone won't make you a leader, but without integrity you will never be one.
name: Zig Ziglar

quote: Solitude is independence.
name: Hermann Hesse

quote: In the absence of any other proof, the thumb alone would convince me of God's existence.
name: Isaac Newton

quote: All men's miseries derive from not being able to sit in a quiet room alone.
name: Blaise Pascal

quote: The strong man is strongest when alone.
name: Friedrich Schiller

quote: I'm open, and I'm out there, but I also enjoy being alone, relaxing.
name: Jazz Jennings

quote: A man is rich in proportion to the number of things he can afford to let alone.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: I have so many different personalities in me and I still feel lonely.
name: Tori Amos

quote: I rise to taste the dawn, and find that love alone will shine today.
name: Ken Wilber

quote: God writes the Gospel not in the Bible alone, but also on trees, and in the flowers and clouds and stars.
name: Martin Luther

quote: It is strange to be known so universally and yet to be so lonely.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: It's better to be healthy alone than sick with someone else.
name: Phil McGraw

quote: Freedom of being alone is intoxicating.
name: Kangana Ranaut

quote: I found that with depression, one of the most important things you could realise is that you're not alone.
name: Dwayne Johnson

quote: Solitude vivifies; isolation kills.
name: Joseph Roux

quote: You have to respect your audience. Without them, you're essentially standing alone, singing to yourself.
name: K. D. Lang

quote: Don't go away. I don't want to be alone. I can't stand being alone.
name: Arnold Rothstein

quote: To live alone is the fate of all great souls.
name: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: Associate yourself with people of good quality, for it is better to be alone than in bad company.
name: Booker T. Washington

quote: What a child can do in cooperation today, he can do alone tomorrow.
name: Lev Vygotsky

quote: I'm calculating, self-sufficient, reserved, and I enjoy being alone.
name: Melissa Sue Anderson

quote: He travels the fastest who travels alone.
name: Rudyard Kipling

quote: A hospital alone shows what war is.
name: Erich Maria Remarque

quote: You cannot go far alone. You enjoy your journey better if you have people by your side.
name: Karan Patel

quote: I paint self-portraits because I am so often alone, because I am the person I know best.
name: Frida Kahlo

quote: It is better to be alone than in bad company.
name: George Washington

quote: These roads do not serve transportation alone, they also bind our Fatherland.
name: Fritz Todt

quote: One travels more usefully when alone, because he reflects more.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Knowledge rests not upon truth alone, but upon error also.
name: Carl Jung

quote: Never chase a lie. Let it alone, and it will run itself to death.
name: Lyman Beecher

quote: The people, and the people alone, are the motive force in the making of world history.
name: Mao Zedong

quote: All we ask is to be let alone.
name: Jefferson Davis

quote: Never trust a man, who when left alone with a tea cosey... Doesn't try it on.
name: Billy Connolly

quote: Plant and your spouse plants with you; weed and you weed alone.
name: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: You cannot be lonely if you like the person you're alone with.
name: Wayne Dyer

quote: Remember that the revolution is what is important, and each one of us, alone, is worth nothing.
name: Che Guevara

quote: With the brush we merely tint, while the imagination alone produces colour.
name: Theodore Gericault

quote: Only the lonely know the way I feel tonight.
name: Roy Orbison

quote: I had a fear of being alone.
name: Gloria Gaynor

quote: The lonely become either thoughtful or empty.
name: Mason Cooley

quote: Every man is born as many men and dies as a single one.
name: Martin Heidegger

quote: I finally faced the fact that it isn't a crime not having friends. Being alone means you have fewer problems.
name: Whitney Houston

quote: You can't please everybody. I give up. I'm not trying to. I don't care. Leave me alone with that.
name: Estelle

quote: Success comes when people act together; failure tends to happen alone.
name: Deepak Chopra

quote: The perfection of Christian character depends wholly upon the grace and strength found alone in God.
name: Ellen G. White

quote: Nothing makes us so lonely as our secrets.
name: Paul Tournier

quote: I am not afraid of being alone and single.
name: LeToya Luckett

quote: It's amazing living alone. I'm very lucky. It's like a refuge.
name: Paloma Faith

quote: To me, the Holocaust stands alone as the most horrible human event in modern civilization.
name: Robert Shapiro

quote: Unless we love and are loved, each of us is alone, each of us is deeply lonely.
name: Mortimer Adler

quote: You can't play a symphony alone, it takes an orchestra to play it.
name: Navjot Singh Sidhu

quote: Rigid, the skeleton of habit alone upholds the human frame.
name: Virginia Woolf

quote: We are all sentenced to solitary confinement inside our own skins, for life.
name: Tennessee Williams

quote: Blood alone moves the wheels of history.
name: Martin Luther

quote: When you are a successful business person, you are only as good as your team. No one can do every deal alone.
name: Magic Johnson

quote: Good wishes alone will not ensure peace.
name: Alfred Nobel

quote: Work, apart from devotion or love of God, is helpless and cannot stand alone.
name: Ramakrishna

quote: You aren't going to leave me alone are you?
name: Edie Adams

quote: In any great organization it is far, far safer to be wrong with the majority than to be right alone.
name: John Kenneth Galbraith

quote: The foolish and the dead alone never change their opinions.
name: James Russell Lowell

quote: Grief can't be shared. Everyone carries it alone. His own burden in his own way.
name: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: Singing provides a true sense of lightheartedness. If I sing when I am alone, I feel wonderful. It's freedom.
name: Andrea Bocelli

quote: A well-instructed people alone can be permanently a free people.
name: James Madison

quote: No one is good but God alone. What is good is therefore divine, what is divine is therefore good.
name: Saint Ambrose

quote: As a body everyone is single, as a soul never.
name: Hermann Hesse

quote: I may climb perhaps to no great heights, but I will climb alone.
name: Cyrano de Bergerac

quote: It took living alone for me to really get to know myself.
name: Camila Mendes

quote: Schizophrenia beats dining alone.
name: Oscar Levant

quote: It is very easy to love alone.
name: Gertrude Stein

quote: I'm so accustomed to being alone.
name: Leighton Meester

quote: When we dream alone it is only a dream, but when many dream together it is the beginning of a new reality.
name: Friedensreich Hundertwasser

quote: If Galileo had said in verse that the world moved, the inquisition might have let him alone.
name: Thomas Hardy

quote: My version of Superman is essentially of a guy who has spent his whole life alone.
name: Henry Cavill

quote: If I have freedom in my love, And in my soul am free, - Angels alone that soar above, Enjoy such liberty.
name: Richard Lovelace

quote: Virtue is not left to stand alone. He who practices it will have neighbors.
name: Confucius

quote: Being alone on the moors is scary; as the rain clouds settle in, it makes you realise your place in nature.
name: Dave Davies

quote: The light of lights looks always on the motive, not the deed, the shadow of shadows on the deed alone.
name: William Butler Yeats

quote: I restore myself when I'm alone.
name: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Freedom is the sure possession of those alone who have the courage to defend it.
name: Pericles

quote: I don't want to be alone, I want to be left alone.
name: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Remember, man does not live on bread alone: sometimes he needs a little buttering up.
name: John C. Maxwell

quote: We are rarely proud when we are alone.
name: Voltaire

quote: Time, which alone makes the reputation of men, ends by making their defects respectable.
name: Voltaire

quote: I am alone; I am always alone no matter what.
name: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Talent alone gets you nowhere. You really have to have the grit, and you gotta have a love for people.
name: Zac Brown

quote: Getting through the nights is the toughest part. Being alone. Not having her there to talk to.
name: Stuart Appleby

quote: An artist is always alone - if he is an artist. No, what the artist needs is loneliness.
name: Henry Miller

quote: It is clear that not in one thing alone, but in many ways equality and freedom of speech are a good thing.
name: Herodotus

quote: I learned how not to be alone in the playground.
name: Emil Ferris

quote: Self-reverence, self-knowledge, self-control; these three alone lead life to sovereign power.
name: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: Human beings should be held accountable. Leave God alone. He has enough problems.
name: Elie Wiesel

quote: The strongest man in the world is he who stands most alone.
name: Henrik Ibsen

quote: He alone is free who lives with free consent under the entire guidance of reason.
name: Baruch Spinoza

quote: It is the fight alone that pleases us, not the victory.
name: Blaise Pascal

quote: I would be married, but I'd have no wife, I would be married to a single life.
name: Charles Bukowski

quote: A human being is a single being. Unique and unrepeatable.
name: Eileen Caddy

quote: You're only lonely if you're not there for you.
name: Phil McGraw

quote: I've been called a recluse. There's definitely truth in that. I like to spend time alone.
name: Kendrick Lamar

quote: What is uttered from the heart alone, Will win the hearts of others to your own.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Change alone is eternal, perpetual, immortal.
name: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: Health consists with temperance alone.
name: Alexander Pope

quote: The true and solid peace of nations consists not in equality of arms, but in mutual trust alone.
name: Pope John XXIII

quote: When so many are lonely as seem to be lonely, it would be inexcusably selfish to be lonely alone.
name: Tennessee Williams

quote: I cannot live under pressures from patrons, let alone paint.
name: Michelangelo

quote: Compassion alone stands apart from the continuous traffic between good and evil proceeding within us.
name: Eric Hoffer

quote: I don't like being alone.
name: Cristiano Ronaldo

quote: He alone loves the Creator perfectly who manifests a pure love for his neighbor.
name: Venerable Bede

quote: I love being on the road with others, with a camera, but also being alone writing poetry.
name: Tony Harrison

quote: The thought of being alone when time goes on is a little bit scary sometimes, but not really.
name: Celia Hammond

quote: Wisdom is not wisdom when it is derived from books alone.
name: Horace

quote: Do not rely completely on any other human being, however dear. We meet all life's greatest tests alone.
name: Agnes Macphail

quote: No one can arrive from being talented alone, work transforms talent into genius.
name: Anna Pavlova

quote: I've lived on my own since I was 18, and I really love living alone. That, to me, is just great.
name: Danielle Fishel

quote: Travelling alone was like laundry for my thoughts.
name: Mark Foster

quote: My missus knows to leave me alone.
name: Brian O'Driscoll

quote: Men was formed for society, and is neither capable of living alone, nor has the courage to do it.
name: William Blackstone

quote: It's very hard to write a song alone. It's only by jamming that you can get a song together.
name: Maurice Gibb

quote: Inside myself is a place where I live all alone and that is where I renew my springs that never dry up.
name: Pearl S. Buck

quote: When you have two busy kids running around the house, returning e-mails is a task, let alone surfing the web.
name: Tom Brady

quote: I've found that if you're not responsive to e-mail, it trains people to leave you alone.
name: David Karp

quote: Is he alone who has courage on his right hand and faith on his left hand?
name: Charles Lindbergh

quote: Artists walk alone.
name: Ezra Miller

quote: A lot of people prefer to be alone. They would rather be a palm tree on an island. I don't get it.
name: Jose Andres

quote: Moon! Moon! I am prone before you. Pity me, and drench me in loneliness.
name: Amy Lowell

quote: Let your mind alone, and see what happens.
name: Virgil Thomson

quote: Man is a creature who lives not upon bread alone, but primarily by catchwords.
name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: To Follow by faith alone is to follow blindly.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: The man who goes alone can start today; but he who travels with another must wait till that other is ready.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: I remember being alone a lot as a child, and I still love to be alone.
name: Cindy Williams

quote: I'm fiercely independent, but I'm also terrified of being alone.
name: Adam Levine

quote: No face which we can give to a matter will stead us so well at last as the truth. This alone wears well.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Nothing we do, however virtuous, can be accomplished alone; therefore we are saved by love.
name: Reinhold Niebuhr

quote: Reason is not automatic. Those who deny it cannot be conquered by it. Do not count on them. Leave them alone.
name: Ayn Rand

quote: Wisdom alone is the science of other sciences.
name: Plato

quote: It is error alone which needs the support of government. Truth can stand by itself.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Now that I'm older, I have a much better appreciation of nature, and I love being alone.
name: Gia Coppola

quote: The only real progress lies in learning to be wrong all alone.
name: Albert Camus

quote: I have always worked better alone and from my own impressions.
name: Claude Monet

quote: Like they say, you can learn more from a guide in one day than you can in three months fishing alone.
name: Mario Lopez

quote: I love photo sessions. I'm alone, I'm the queen, everyone's taking care of me.
name: Eva Herzigova

quote: Living alone makes it harder to find someone to blame.
name: Mason Cooley

quote: It's time to end the cruel slaughter of whales and leave these magnificent creatures alone.
name: Paul McCartney

quote: Wisdom comes alone through suffering.
name: Aeschylus

quote: Recommend virtue to your children; it alone, not money, can make them happy. I speak from experience.
name: Ludwig van Beethoven

quote: Then stirs the feeling infinite, so felt In solitude, where we are least alone.
name: Lord Byron

quote: When the traveler goes alone he gets acquainted with himself.
name: Liberty Hyde Bailey

quote: I'm never less at leisure than when at leisure, or less alone than when alone.
name: Scipio Africanus

quote: You alone are enough.
name: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Ah, mon cher, for anyone who is alone, without God and without a master, the weight of days is dreadful.
name: Albert Camus

quote: Life is only a long and bitter suicide, and faith alone can transform this suicide into a sacrifice.
name: Franz Liszt

quote: Your actions, and your action alone, determines your worth.
name: Evelyn Waugh

quote: I hate being alone, even for 10 minutes.
name: Clare Balding

quote: When the people you love are gone, you're alone.
name: Keanu Reeves

quote: On stage I make love to twenty five thousand people; and then I go home alone.
name: Janis Joplin

quote: Grant that I may not pray alone with the mouth; help me that I may pray from the depths of my heart.
name: Martin Luther

quote: If men knew how women pass the time when they are alone, they'd never marry.
name: O. Henry

quote: Genius begins great works; labor alone finishes them.
name: Joseph Joubert

quote: Work doesn't seem to interfere with my life. I have time for everything, even time to be alone.
name: Carolina Herrera

quote: The struggle alone pleases us, not the victory.
name: Blaise Pascal

quote: I'm very shy really. I spend a lot of time in my room alone reading or writing or watching television.
name: Johnny Cash

quote: A leader does not deserve the name unless he is willing occasionally to stand alone.
name: Henry Kissinger

quote: If you make friends with yourself you will never be alone.
name: Maxwell Maltz

quote: Autobiography begins with a sense of being alone. It is an orphan form.
name: John Berger

quote: I like to race, not to do laps alone.
name: Fernando Alonso

quote: We can all understand that feeling of being alone in the world trying to find ways to not be alone.
name: Andrew Haigh

quote: I understand being alone. I understand not liking it, wishing for something else.
name: Richard Jenkins

quote: Down to Gehenna, or up to the Throne, He travels the fastest who travels alone.
name: Rudyard Kipling

quote: Education alone can conduct us to that enjoyment which is, at once, best in quality and infinite in quantity.
name: Horace Mann

quote: The object of oratory alone in not truth, but persuasion.
name: Thomas Babington Macaulay

quote: The best of artists has no conception that the marble alone does not contain within itself.
name: Michelangelo

quote: Man alone is born crying, lives complaining, and dies disappointed.
name: Samuel Johnson

quote: The artist alone sees spirits. But after he has told of their appearing to him, everybody sees them.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: I think a lot of kids feel alone and slightly isolated and in their own world.
name: Tim Burton

quote: Jesus alone cleanses from sin; He only can forgive our transgressions.
name: Ellen G. White

quote: We are nothing if we walk alone; we are everything when we walk together in step with other dignified feet.
name: Subcomandante Marcos

quote: Using simple equipment and daylight alone is for me a pleasure and a replenishment.
name: Irving Penn

quote: No nation can meet the world's challenges alone.
name: Hillary Clinton

quote: Change alone is unchanging.
name: Heraclitus

quote: The universe, when you leave it alone, is going to be beautiful.
name: Yoko Ono

quote: I want to be with those who know secret things or else alone.
name: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: I don't eat with beautiful women alone.
name: Billy Graham

quote: I think it's interesting that 'cologne' rhymes with 'alone.'
name: Demetri Martin

quote: Better be alone than in bad company.
name: Thomas Fuller

quote: I would say, 'I'm alone, but I'm not lonely.' But I was just kidding myself.
name: Bruce Willis

quote: I will never be happy without having someone. Going to sleep alone kills me.
name: Elon Musk

quote: No dream is ever chased alone.
name: Rahul Dravid

quote: When I'm online, I'm alone in a room, tapping on a keyboard, staring at a cathode-ray tube.
name: Clifford Stoll

quote: An Englishman, even if he is alone, forms an orderly queue of one.
name: George Mikes

quote: We learn about life not from plusses alone, but from minuses as well.
name: Anton Chekhov

quote: If I am a legend, then why am I so lonely?
name: Judy Garland

quote: Your experiences will be yours alone. But truth and best friendship will rarely if ever disappoint you.
name: Anne Lamott

quote: I like to read books and be alone; I'm not social butterfly person. I'm sorry.
name: Hope Solo

quote: Deliberation is the work of many men. Action, of one alone.
name: Charles de Gaulle

quote: It's an amazing feeling to go into a studio and really be alone.
name: Joaquin Phoenix

quote: In the country of pain we are each alone.
name: May Sarton

quote: I am convinced that living in an enclave shapes the personality, and living alone shapes the personality too.
name: Mary Douglas

quote: Anything that makes you feel the most alone also has the greatest power to connect you.
name: Ze Frank

quote: I can't really define it in sexual terms alone although our sexuality is so energizing why not enjoy it too?
name: Audre Lorde

quote: I need to do things on my own, need to be left alone.
name: Henry Rollins

quote: On stage, I make love to 25,000 different people, then I go home alone.
name: Janis Joplin

quote: I would hope that understanding and reconciliation are not limited to the 19th hole alone.
name: Gerald R. Ford

quote: I got married for the wrong reasons. I was tired of being alone. I have to own that. It was me, not her.
name: Steve Harvey

quote: You only grow when you are alone.
name: Paul Newman

quote: I was very happy sitting alone at a dining room table, writing a script.
name: Conrad Hall

quote: People eat duck and you think, well, we've got loads of chickens, leave the ducks alone!
name: Karl Pilkington

quote: Solitude is the profoundest fact of the human condition. Man is the only being who knows he is alone.
name: Octavio Paz

quote: Don't ever let economic alone determine your career or how you spend the majority of your time.
name: Denis Waitley

quote: I have my best ideas when I am alone.
name: Leona Lewis

quote: The right to be let alone is indeed the beginning of all freedoms.
name: William O. Douglas

quote: Your life is yours and yours alone. Rise up and live it.
name: Terry Goodkind

quote: She can't even chew gum and walk in a straight line, let alone write a book.
name: Liam Gallagher

quote: I actually like being alone. I spend most evenings reading and taking long baths.
name: Shonda Rhimes

quote: Know then this truth, enough for man to know virtue alone is happiness below.
name: Alexander Pope

quote: Confession alone is not necessarily good for the soul.
name: Pete Hamill

quote: If there's anything worse than a woman living alone, it's a woman saying she likes it.
name: Thelma Ritter

quote: I have learnt to enjoy my own company because I have lived alone many years.
name: Winnie Byanyima

quote: No man is an island. No man stands alone.
name: Dennis Brown

quote: Over the years I have been kind of lazy, thinking my talent alone can do it.
name: Asafa Powell

quote: You can work on the saxophone alone, but ultimately you must perform with others.
name: Steve Lacy

quote: I'm always happy when I'm left alone, but if somebody comes and is nice, then we talk.
name: Maximilian Schell

quote: Sometimes I think we're alone. Sometimes I think we're not. In either case, the thought is staggering.
name: R. Buckminster Fuller

quote: I like the idea of being a sculptor. Just me alone, making something - that solitary existence.
name: Ewan McGregor

quote: From 18 to 22, I was alone, living in L.A. with a bunch of friends, partying.
name: Heath Ledger

quote: When thinking about companions gone, we feel ourselves doubly alone.
name: Walter Scott

quote: Victims always feel alone and helpless.
name: Deepak Chopra

quote: The Lord had the wonderful advantage of being able to work alone.
name: Kofi Annan

quote: I got in touch with the creative process between the age of 14 and 16, mainly because I was alone so much.
name: Chris Cornell

quote: The surest way to be alone is to get married.
name: Gloria Steinem

quote: Running alone is the toughest. You get to the point where you have to keep pushing yourself.
name: Walter Payton

quote: All men's misfortunes spring from their hatred of being alone.
name: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: Am I not peaceful? We want to be free - completely free. Free to be free. We want to be left alone.
name: Sukarno

quote: That heart alone is hard which does not shudder at itself for not feeling its hardness.
name: Saint Bernard

quote: The idea of feeling isolated is scary to me - to walk through the world alone would be heartbreaking.
name: Jacqueline Woodson

quote: Picture yourself vividly as winning, and that alone will contribute immeasurably to success.
name: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quote: It is easier to win than to fail. Everybody sides with the winner. But the failure walks alone.
name: George Matthew Adams

quote: No woman has to be a victim of physical abuse. Women have to feel like they are not alone.
name: Salma Hayek

quote: I don't know. I think it's funny! I think it's funny! I go, what? It's so absurd. I'm alone.
name: Danny DeVito

quote: I don't know that I spent any more time alone than any other kid, but being by myself never bothered me.
name: Joseph Barbera

quote: No matter how close to yours another's steps have grown, in the end there is one dance you'll do alone.
name: Jackson Browne

quote: I was rowing the boat alone against a tide, running against an incumbent in 2013.
name: Elise Stefanik

quote: I do my best work alone. I travel alone a lot.
name: Seth Rollins

quote: By being friends with all, we are not alone.
name: Hamad bin Isa Al Khalifa

quote: Every animal leaves traces of what it was; man alone leaves traces of what he created.
name: Jacob Bronowski

quote: Eagles commonly fly alone. They are crows, daws, and starlings that flock together.
name: John Webster

quote: Work alone will efface the footsteps of work.
name: James Whistler

quote: I've learned that intelligence alone doesn't mean a damn thing. It only leads to violence and pain.
name: Daniel Keyes

quote: A novel usually begins, in my experience, with a thought or image that won't leave me alone.
name: John Lanchester

quote: Very much alone in my work, I am almost jealous of it.
name: Yves Tanguy

quote: Events alone rarely provide much guide to the future.
name: Walter Lord

quote: Photography can never grow up if it imitates some other medium. It has to walk alone; it has to be itself.
name: Berenice Abbott

quote: I'm an introvert. I get my energy by spending time alone. I need that hour or two to myself every day.
name: Amit Bhatia

quote: In order to survive, you have to be alone with yourself to regenerate the spirit.
name: Danielle Darrieux

quote: As freak legislation, the antitrust laws stand alone. Nobody knows what it is they forbid.
name: Isabel Paterson

quote: I alone, as the sharer of their way of life, presented a replica of childhood.
name: Neal Cassady

quote: We're all in this alone.
name: Lily Tomlin

quote: Absolutely lonely people have few personal interactions of any kind.
name: Martha Beck

quote: Fail I alone, in words and deeds? Why, all men strive and who succeeds?
name: Robert Browning

quote: I know what men want. Men want to be really, really close to someone who will leave them alone.
name: Elayne Boosler

quote: I was sleeping the other night, alone, thanks to the exterminator.
name: Emo Philips

quote: Successful crimes alone are justified.
name: John Dryden

quote: How hard it is to have the beautiful interdependence of marriage and yet be strong in oneself alone.
name: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: All of our unhappiness comes from our inability to be alone.
name: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: It's motive alone which gives character to the actions of men.
name: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: I never liked big parties, especially going alone. I much prefer smaller gatherings that are more intimate.
name: Yolanda Hadid

quote: Buddhism notes that it is always a mistake to think your soul can go it alone.
name: Annie Dillard

quote: Religion is the possibility of the removal of every ground of confidence except confidence in God alone.
name: Karl Barth

quote: Let me alone, and go in search of someone else.
name: Ali ibn Abi Talib

quote: The words of the Bible, and the Bible alone, should be heard from the pulpit.
name: Ellen G. White

quote: Children, dear and loving children, can alone console a woman for the loss of her beauty.
name: Honore de Balzac

quote: I want to be alone.
name: Greta Garbo

quote: I never said, 'I want to be alone.' I only said, 'I want to be left alone.' There is all the difference.
name: Greta Garbo

quote: By all means use some time to be alone.
name: Edward Young

quote: I think I learned pretty early that in the end, it's only you. To an extent, you're all alone.
name: Lee Atwater

quote: Solitude is un-American.
name: Erica Jong

quote: The older I grow, the more I find myself alone.
name: Alberto Giacometti

quote: You can't fake it when you're alone with God, you know.
name: Jim Bakker

quote: So it is necessary that we should learn to be alone.
name: Anna Neagle

quote: There is no need for nuclear. The world can be powered by wind, water and sun alone.
name: Mark Z. Jacobson

quote: Man, I hate to get depressing on you, but I don't have a game. I'm so alone, so depressed, so dark, no.
name: Jason Schwartzman

quote: He never is alone that is accompanied with noble thoughts.
name: John Fletcher

quote: Lord of myself, accountable to none, but to my conscience, and my God alone.
name: John Oldham

quote: I spent a huge amount of time by myself. I daydreamed and learned how to be alone and not be lonely.
name: Rachel Kushner

quote: I very much wished not to be noticed, and to be left alone, and I sort of succeeded.
name: Mary Oliver

quote: Muslims must believe that all power, success and victory comes from God alone.
name: Abu Bakar Bashir

quote: You do stand alone sometimes. But my mother stood by me through all this.
name: Morris Dees

quote: If you can measure success in this business based on happiness alone I feel like I've hit the lottery.
name: Justin Long

quote: I am alone, some people help me, but, basically, I can do what I want.
name: Sergei Bubka

quote: I try to motivate people and inspire them, to let them know that they're not alone.
name: Jason David Frank

quote: It is well to be alone. It fertilizes the creative impulse.
name: Max Nordau

quote: Remember we're all in this alone.
name: Lily Tomlin

quote: He that can live alone resembles the brute beast in nothing, the sage in much, and God in everything.
name: Baltasar Gracian

quote: Early on, if I was alone two three nights in a row, I'd start writing poems about suicide.
name: Jack Nicholson

quote: The capacity for not feeling lonely can carry a very real price, that of feeling nothing at all.
name: Douglas Coupland

quote: When I'm alone, I can sleep crossways in bed without an argument.
name: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quote: I was never less alone than when by myself.
name: Edward Gibbon

quote: A writer looking for subjects inquires not after what he loves best, but after what he alone loves at all.
name: Annie Dillard

quote: I'm very happy alone.
name: Octavia E. Butler

quote: Even in the presence of others he was completely alone.
name: Robert M. Pirsig

quote: The longer one is alone, the easier it is to hear the song of the earth.
name: Robert Anton Wilson

quote: There are places and moments in which one is so completely alone that one sees the world entire.
name: Jules Renard

quote: A man content to go to heaven alone will never go to heaven.
name: Boethius

quote: Be able to be alone. Lose not the advantage of solitude, and the society of thyself.
name: Thomas Browne

quote: I'm happily single.
name: Paula Abdul

quote: In Genesis, it says that it is not good for a man to be alone; but sometimes it is a great relief.
name: John Barrymore

quote: I think the greatest amount of pressure is the pressure I place on myself. So in a way I chose to be alone.
name: Cathy Freeman

quote: For me, working alone is being able to express, which is the artistic part.
name: Kevin Parker

quote: If you're going to put yourself above everybody else, you might end up alone.
name: Joseph Gordon-Levitt

quote: Sometimes, a writer's life alone can tell a story.
name: Howard Jacobson

quote: To be adult is to be alone.
name: Jean Rostand
